Articles.Content:
I want to apologize in advance if this question isn't in the right forum. I am curious if this wonderful resource is going to be expanded upon? It seems like there is alot of unfilled slots. While I understand this is a labor of love, and those few individuals who stream do so at their own expense, I would imagine you have a host of streamers who would be willing to donate their time.

Thanks kindly for your attention,

1Abrexus
I'm not sure anybody even reads those applications.
You'd be surprised, "those applications" are definitely considered.
I am also thinking about starting a live stream on twitch, though I have no experience at all

You'd be surprised, "those applications" are definitely considered.

Well then I guess nobody is applying because there's an awful lot of empty space on KSP TV.
2 new streamers this week, me gusta

I'm not sure anybody even reads those applications.

As the person who reads the applications, I assure you they are looked at. We've just finished bringing in several new streamers who started last weekend & today even. It just takes time to get new streamers ready to go, and I don't want to rush too many out too quickly.

I hope you guys are enjoying the new streamers btw, they are a lot of fun.

Thanks all for your replies. I did notice some new faces this week and welcome to them all. I guess my thread was a bit premature as I did not realize you were accepting applications. Thanks to all involved for making KSPTV great!

`Abrexus
